summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Twenty-fourth Avenue, from the present grade between East Spring and East Marion Street to East Cherry Street; and East Marion Street and East Columbia Street, between Twenty-third Avenue and Twenty-fourth Avenue (at point of present grade) to Twenty-fifth Avenue, by grading, parking and constructing cement sidewalks, in accordance with Majority Petition, being File No. 33839; and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
